scripts.build: directus-extension build; mkdir -p ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce/dist; cp package.json ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce; cp dist/index.js ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce/dist
scripts.dev: directus-extension build -w --no-minify; mkdir -p ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce/dist; cp package.json ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce; cp dist/index.js ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-editor-tinymce/dist
